ok, the re-render functionality seems to work, time to take a break
towards reducing number of ajax calls launched by the cache, also taking apart the cache into two logical pieces : data handling / communication handling

now we need to figure out a way to re-render the child of the CacheInjectorHOC
maybe by setting a state of of the `CacheInjectorHOC` whenever a re-render is needed and then at the same time setting a new CacheInterface
maybe the `CacheInjectorHOC` could have a state of "Int"
and whenever that is incremented the `CacheInjectorHOC` sets the prop of the child to "something", say, to a new `CacheInterface`
every time the CacheInjectorHOC gets mounted, it sets the re-render-triggerer
so setting the re-render-triggerer is not the responsibility of `CacheInjectorHOC`'s child but of the `CacheInjectorHOC` itsel
